text: Kevin Thomas Barry (born August 18, 1978) is an American former right-handed pitcher for the Atlanta Braves and current area scout for the Braves. Barry grew up in the Princeton Junction section of West Windsor Township, New JerseyMeggitt, Jane. "Braves give Barry a shot at major league pitching" , Allentown Examiner, July 3, 2006. Accessed February 22, 2011. "Kevin grew up in West Windsor, and the two dated while Samantha attended Allentown High School and The College of New Jersey in Ewing. He went to West Windsor High School and Rider University in the Lawrenceville section of Lawrence. The couple married in 2003." and is a graduate of West Windsor-Plainsboro High School South.Kevin Barry player profile, Atlanta Braves. Accessed May 20, 2007. "Graduated from Windsor-Plainsboro High School South in Princeton Junction, NJ." He was drafted by the Braves in the 14th round of the 2001 draft.Kevin Barry - Atlanta Braves - MLB - Yahoo! Sports He has played with the Myrtle Beach Pelicans and the Richmond Braves. Barry was one of two pitchers (Chuck James being the other) called up from the Braves farm system after the release of Mike Remlinger. He made his major league debut on June 26, 2006 against the New York Yankees and subsequently and surprisingly struck out Jason Giambi. Barry is currently working for the Atlanta Braves Organization as an area scout. He has held this role since 2009.Atlanta Braves send Garr, Barry to Draft ==References== ==External links== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Águilas del Zulia players Category:Atlanta Braves players Category:Atlanta Braves scouts Category:Baseball players from New Jersey Category:Greenville Braves players Category:Jamestown Jammers players Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:Mesa Solar Sox players Category:Mississippi Braves players Category:Myrtle Beach Pelicans players Category:People from Monmouth County, New Jersey Category:People from West Windsor Township, New Jersey Category:Richmond Braves players Category:Rider Broncs baseball players Category:Sportspeople from Mercer County, New Jersey Category:Tiburones de La Guaira players Category:West Windsor-Plainsboro High School South alumni
title: Kevin Barry (baseball)
